about_the_game:
Experience your magical rebirth in the world of VeeR. Explore, gather and fight to uncover the truth behind this mysterious realm.



Travel across these foreign lands, its magic and secrets are for you to discover. Solve puzzles, locate treasures, and bag priceless LOOT.



The world of VeeR is filled with magical artifacts and resources, to advance in your journey a trustworthy weapon is always appreciated.

Utilize the resources the world has to offer to craft and upgrade a multitude of equipment, or alternatively trade them with the locals to improve relations and acquire gold.



Mythical beings roam across the magical world of VeeR, some hostile, some friendly.

Different creatures possess different fighting styles, memorize their attack patterns in order to parry their strikes and go on the counter offensive. Master your weapons and unlock the abilities that lie within to obliterate anyone that stands in your way. The combat in this game is turn-based and filled with action.



Forced into the world of VeeR with no way out, you must uncover the secrets of VeeR and return to your original world.

You are a stranger in their lands. Assist the denizens of VeeR so that you may gain their trust to obtain valuable information and perhaps, more?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What are you waiting for? Start your story and be reborn to VeeR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500x or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GEForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 400 Series or better
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon 500 Series or better
  • VR Support: OpenXR
